availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Allen May (Louisville, Jefferson County, KY, assistant US marshal)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, assistant U.S. marshal. Kentucky native. Son of Gabriel T. May and Eliza E. Tucker May. Attended school in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Assistant U.S. marshal in Louisville in 1860. Assistant U.S. marshal in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 1, p. 72A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 1, p. 207.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000482706, p. 163.
